SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.events

Class LotterySystem

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.events.LotterySystem
public class LotterySystem extends Object
Represents a lottery system for selecting winners from a waitlist of users.

This system maintains a list of winners and a waitlist of eligible users. It provides functionality to randomly select winners, handle declined spots, and manage the current waitlist.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LotterySystem()
    Default constructor that initializes an empty list of winners and an empty waitlist.

    Constructs a LotterySystem with a predefined list of waitlisted users.

  • Constructor Details

    • LotterySystem

      public LotterySystem()
      Default constructor that initializes an empty list of winners and an empty waitlist.

    • LotterySystem

      public LotterySystem(ArrayList<User> waitlistedUsers)
      Constructs a LotterySystem with a predefined list of waitlisted users.
      Parameters:
      waitlistedUsers - the list of users to initialize the waitlist with

  • Method Details

    • selectWinners

      public ArrayList<User> selectWinners(int eventCapacity)
      Selects a number of winners from the waitlist based on the event capacity. The winners are removed from the waitlist once selected.
      Parameters:
      eventCapacity - the maximum number of winners to select
      Returns:
      a list of User objects representing the selected winners

    • getWinners

      public ArrayList<User> getWinners()
      Returns the list of currently selected winners.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of User objects representing the winners

    • getWaitlist

      public Waitlist getWaitlist()
      Returns the current waitlist used in this lottery system.
      Returns:
      the Waitlist object associated with this system
